name: Neil Edwards
description: i am a single father of two wonderful angels, i love being me and i love the outdoors, i am not so religious but i know i’m God fearing. i am a good friend, a caring brother, a loving man and a sweet father. i follow my instincts, i’m honest,thoughtful, i would say i’m stubborn but i do learn from my mistakes. i’ve got a sacarstic sense of humour, i love to be happy and i wish to meet someone to make me a complete man. i wouldn’t toot my own horn but if you wish to know more about me, please don’t hesitate to text me.
